scripts.build_node:scp: echo 'scpjs is not supported to be build with node as target.'
scripts.build_exe: bun run build_exe:cp; bun run build_exe:scp; bun run build_exe:rm
scripts.build_exe_linux: bun run build_exe_linux:cp; bun run build_exe_linux:scp; bun run build_exe_linux:rm
scripts.build_node: bun build --outdir dist --target node src/cpjs.ts src/rmjs.ts; bun run build_node:scp
scripts.build: bun build --outdir dist --target bun src/cpjs.ts src/scpjs.ts src/rmjs.ts
scripts.build_all: bun run build_exe; bun run build_exe_linux; bun run build
scripts.watch: bun build --outdir dist --target bun src/cpjs.ts src/scpjs.ts src/rmjs.ts --watch
